title: The Rise of Bukidnon Culture
description: This exhibit showcases the rich cultural heritage of Bukidnon, featuring traditional clothing, rituals, and ancestral practices that shaped the identity of the indigenous tribes across the province.

title: The Battle for Independence
description: A collection of artifacts, documents, and stories highlighting the struggles and victories of local heroes who fought for freedom during the colonial era in the Philippines.

title: Ancient Tools & Early Settlements
description: An exhibit displaying primitive tools, pottery, and early settlement remains that provide insight into how ancient communities lived, farmed, and adapted to the environment.

title: The Evolution of Philippine Currency
description: A timeline of the Philippine currency system, showcasing old coins, paper bills, and rare monetary artifacts used from pre-colonial trade up to the modern era.

title: Legends of the Mindanao Highlands
description: This exhibit highlights mythical stories and folklore passed down through generations, narrating the origin tales, heroes, and creatures believed to have roamed the highlands of Mindanao.

title: The Heritage of Local Crafts
description: A display of traditional crafts such as weaving, wood carving, and metalwork, emphasizing the skill, artistry, and cultural significance behind locally made creations.
